lead_paragraph: A grand jury’s indictment of two abortion opponents who recorded Planned Parenthood officials is the latest sign that a campaign against the group has run into trouble.
snippet: A grand jury’s indictment of two abortion opponents who recorded Planned Parenthood officials is the latest sign that a campaign against the group has run into trouble.

headline.main: Indictment Deals Blow to G.O.P. Over Planned Parenthood Battle
headline.print_headline: Indictment Deals Another Blow to G.O.P. Campaign Against Planned Parenthood

abstract: Houston grand jury indictment of abortion opponents David R Daleiden and Sandra S Merritt, of Center for Medical Progress, who secretly recorded Planned Parenthood officials, is most recent blow to Republican campaign against the federally funded organization; Senate leaders fear impact of indictment could even threaten several Republican seats, and consequently GOP's majority.
